aiAssistant.title: AI Farming Assistant
aiAssistant.inputPlaceholder: Ask about farming, describe your image...

welcome.summary:
Hello! I'm {appName}'s AI Knowledge assistant, your dedicated partner for all things agriculture!
Wondering about sustainable farming, navigating the agri-supply chain, or boosting your farming business? Just ask! I can also guide you through using the DamDoh app's features.

**Got a crop concern?**
Tap the image upload icon (<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" strokeWidth="2" strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-image-up inline-block relative -top-px"><path d="M10.3 21H5a2 2 0 0 1-2-2V5a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14a2 2 0 0 1 2 2v10l-3.1-3.1a2 2 0 0 0-2.814.014L13 16"></path><path d="m14 19.5 3-3 3 3"></path><path d="M17 22v-5.5"></path><circle cx="9" cy="9" r="2"></circle></svg>) to upload a photo, or the camera icon (<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" strokeWidth="2" strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-camera inline-block relative -top-px"><path d="M14.5 4h-5L7 7H4a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v9a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h16a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V9a2 2 0 0 0-2-2h-3l-2.5-3z"></path><circle cx="12" cy="13" r="3"></circle></svg>) to snap a picture of any plant issues. I'll do my best to analyze it and suggest sustainable solutions.

Ready to explore? How can I assist you today?
welcome.suggestion1: How do I make Fish Amino Acid?
welcome.suggestion2: What is 'God's Blanket' in Farming God's Way?
welcome.suggestion3: How can I improve my soil health?

settingsPage.title: Settings
settingsPage.description: Manage your account, agricultural profile, and platform preferences.

profileTab.title: Stakeholder Profile Settings
profileTab.description: Update your public information for the agricultural supply chain network.
profileTab.emailDescription: Email cannot be changed here as it's tied to your login.
profileTab.summaryPlaceholder: e.g., Exporter of fair-trade coffee, specializing in East African beans...
profileTab.bioPlaceholder: Share more about your operations, mission, products, services, or what you're seeking in the supply chain...
profileTab.interestsPlaceholder: e.g., Organic farming, Supply chain logistics, Export, Cashew processing
profileTab.needsPlaceholder: e.g., Buyers for cocoa beans, Warehousing space, Agronomy consulting

accountTab.title: Account Settings
accountTab.description: Manage your login credentials and account security.

notificationsTab.title: Notification Settings
notificationsTab.description: Choose how you want to be notified about supply chain activity and platform updates.

emailDigest.title: Email Notifications Digest
emailDigest.description: Receive a summary of important updates, market news, and connection requests.

connectionRequests.title: New Connection Requests
connectionRequests.description: Notify me in-app and optionally by email for new stakeholder connection requests.

forumMentions.title: Forum Contributions & Mentions
forumMentions.description: Notify me for replies to my forum posts or when I'm mentioned.

marketplaceActivity.title: Marketplace Activity
marketplaceActivity.description: Notify me about inquiries on my listings or updates to saved searches.

jobListings.title: Merged Marketplace Updates (Jobs, Services, etc.)
jobListings.description: Notify me about applications to my job/service listings or new relevant offerings.

privacyTab.title: Privacy & Visibility Settings
privacyTab.description: Control who can see your agricultural profile and supply chain activity.

profileVisibility.title: Profile Visibility
profileVisibility.description: Control who can view your full stakeholder profile details.

connectionRequests.title: Connection Requests
connectionRequests.description: Control who can send you connection requests.

contactVisibility.title: Business/Contact Information Visibility
contactVisibility.description: Control who sees your email, phone, or website if provided.

activityStatus.title: Activity Status
activityStatus.description: Let others see when you are online or last active.

searchIndexing.title: External Search Engine Indexing
searchIndexing.description: Allow search engines (e.g., Google) to link to your DamDoh profile (public parts only).

consentManagement.title: Data Consent Management
consentManagement.description: Manage how your data is used and shared with other stakeholders or integrated services.

marketplaceHistory.title: Marketplace History for Financial Services
marketplaceHistory.description: Allows Financial Institutions to view your sales history when you apply for a loan or service, to assess your eligibility.

traceabilityData.title: Public Traceability Data
traceabilityData.description: Allows buyers to view the public traceability log of products you have listed, building trust and transparency.

applicationData.title: AI-Powered Service Recommendations
applicationData.description: Allow DamDoh's AI to analyze your application data to recommend other relevant financial products or services to you.

appearanceTab.title: Appearance
appearanceTab.description: Customize the look and feel of the DamDoh platform.

language.title: Language
language.description: Choose your preferred language for the interface.

walletPage.title: My Digital Wallet
walletPage.description: Manage your DamDoh credits for trading, investments, and platform services (Feature Coming Soon).
walletPage.underDevelopmentDescription: We are building a secure and efficient digital wallet to facilitate transactions within the DamDoh ecosystem. Future capabilities will include:
walletPage.feature1: Viewing your credit balance and transaction history.
walletPage.feature2: Requesting credit for approved investments or large trades.
walletPage.feature3: Securely topping-up your wallet using various payment methods.
walletPage.feature4: Facilitating payments for marketplace transactions and platform services.
walletPage.stayTuned: Stay tuned for updates as we work to enable seamless and secure financial activities for the DamDoh agricultural network.

sustainabilityPage.title: Sustainability & Impact Hub
sustainabilityPage.description: Track your progress towards sustainable agriculture, manage certifications, and explore tools for positive impact across the supply chain.

practicesLog.description: Record and verify your on-farm sustainable activities.
